description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              For our continuously growing subsidiary AdNovum Vietnam LLC in Ho Chi Minh City, we are recruiting Senior Software Engineers. As a Senior Software Engineer you will design and implement sophisticated features either for our NEVIS security suite or for our tailor-made software solutions for renowned customers.
              

              In your daily work, you will
              
              - develop effective solutions for complex business problems in a variety of customer projects
              
              - integrate new components and technologies into existing software systems and architectures
              
              - work on all layers of the software stack (web and mobile UI, business layer, database)
              
              - create unit and integration tests, and fix bugs
              
              - collaborate with other AdNovum employees in cross-functional teams to achieve goals
              
              - mentor less experienced colleagues
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              To master this job, you should have
              
              - a university degree (BSc/MSc) in Computer Science or a related field
              
              - a minimum of 6 years of experience in professional software development
              
              - a minimum of 3 years of experience in developing enterprise Java applications
              
              - a firm understanding of design methodology and a keen interest in new technologies and methods
              
              - at least advanced communication skills in English
              

              *** We offer ***
              
              - different customer projects using technologies like Java 8, Java EE, EJB, JPA, Hibernate, Spring, JUnit, Mockito, Eclipse RCP, WebServices (RESTful, SOAP), JavaScript, Cordova, JSF, Angular (2), HTML5, CSS3, JQuery, etc.
              
              - project assignments according to your skill set and development goals
              
              - working side by side with highly skilled and experienced software engineers
              
              - collaboration with colleagues in Switzerland, Hungary, Portugal and Singapore
              
              - friendly working atmosphere in a well-equipped and professional IT environment
              
              - long-term and stable job with flexible working hours
              
              - a competitive salary plus a performance based bonus, a premium healthcare plan and free English classes
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
